QuestData.Title: Flying Colors
QuestData.Description: You have passed every test we prepared for you, $n. It is now time for you to move on to bigger and better things.$b$b...but not before another banquet. The High Elder will be waiting for you at the banquet grounds to celebrate your graduation from our monastery.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to High Elder Cloudfall at the Tian Monastery in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Congratulations, $n. While your traineeship was strictly honorary, your results were undeniably impressive. The young ones look up to you.$b$bGroundskeeper Wu had this prepared for you. Please, use it as you see fit.
